verses.verse: And <S%H7126>take<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office,<s%> even <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> for <S%H3519>glory<s%> and for <S%H8597>beauty.<s%>

And <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have filled <S%H4390>with<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> to <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> him, that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H6213>make;<s%> a <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> and an <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and a <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and an <S%H8665>embroidered<s%> <S%H3801>coat,<s%> a <S%H4701>miter,<s%> and a <S%H73>girdle:<s%> and they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office.<s%>
And <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

And they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and of <S%H713>purple,<s%> of <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H7806><s%> with <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work.<s%>

It shall <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> shoulder <S%H3802>pieces<s%> thereof <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>edges<s%> thereof; and so it shall be joined <S%H2266>together.<s%>

And the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H642>ephod,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the same, according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> thereof; even of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H8336>linen.<s%> <S%H7806><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H6605>grave<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> them the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> of their <S%H4480>names<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and the other <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> according to their <S%H8435>birth.<s%>

With the <S%H4639>work<s%> of an <S%H2796>engraver<s%> in <S%H68>stone,<s%> like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> shalt thou <S%H6605>engrave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> them to be <S%H4142>set<s%> in <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> for <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%>

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> at the <S%H4020>ends;<s%> of <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> them, and <S%H5414>fasten<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H4865>ouches.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work;<s%> after the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> it; of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and of <S%H713>purple,<s%> and of <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> and of fine twined <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H7806><s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> it.

Foursquare <S%H7251><s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> being <S%H3717>doubled;<s%> a <S%H2239>span<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H2239>span<s%> shall be the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof.

And thou shalt <S%H4390>set<s%> in it <S%H4396>settings<s%> of <S%H68>stones,<s%> even <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones:<s%> the first <S%H2905>row<s%> shall be a <S%H124>sardius,<s%> a <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> and a <S%H1304>carbuncle:<s%> this shall be the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row.<s%>
And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> shall be an <S%H5306>emerald,<s%> a <S%H5601>sapphire,<s%> and a <S%H3095>diamond.<s%>
And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> a <S%H3958>ligure,<s%> an <S%H7618>agate,<s%> and an <S%H306>amethyst.<s%>

And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> a <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> and an <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> and a <S%H3471>jasper:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7660>set<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%> in their <S%H4396>enclosings.<s%>

And the <S%H68>stones<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve,<s%> <S%H6240><s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> their <S%H8034>names,<s%> like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet;<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall they <S%H1961>be<s%> according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8331>chains<s%> at the <S%H1383>ends<s%> of <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> chains of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> which are <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>

And the other <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> chains thou shalt <S%H5414>fasten<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>ouches,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the shoulder <S%H3802>pieces<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> it.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8193>border<s%> thereof, <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And <S%H8147>two<s%> other <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make,<s%> and shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H4480>underneath,<s%> <S%H4295><s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> <S%H4136><s%> the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> thereof, over <S%H5980>against<s%> the other <S%H4225>coupling<s%> thereof, <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

And they shall <S%H7405>bind<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> by the <S%H4480>rings<s%> <S%H2885><s%> thereof <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and that the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2118>loosed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> when he goeth <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H217>Urim<s%> and the <S%H8550>Thummim;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> when he goeth <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue.<s%>

And there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6310>hole<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof: it shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H8193>binding<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of it, as it were the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of a <S%H8473>habergeon,<s%> that it <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7167>rent.<s%>

And beneath <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of it thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and of <S%H713>purple,<s%> and of <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8144><s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> thereof; and <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> them round about: <S%H5439><s%>

A <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to <S%H8334>minister:<s%> and his <S%H6963>sound<s%> shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he goeth <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and when he cometh <S%H3318>out,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6731>plate<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6605>grave<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H6944>HOLINESS<s%> TO THE <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H6616>lace,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4701>miter;<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H4136>forefront<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H4701>miter<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> may <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4979>gifts;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> that they may be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7660>embroider<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4701>miter<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H73>girdle<s%> of <S%H4639>needlework.<s%> <S%H7551><s%>

And for <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3801>coats,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> for them <S%H73>girdles,<s%> and <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> for them, for <S%H3519>glory<s%> and for <S%H8597>beauty.<s%>

And thou shalt put them <S%H3847>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him; and shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> them, and <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> them, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> their <S%H1320>nakedness;<s%> <S%H6172><s%> from the <S%H4480>loins<s%> <S%H4975><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3409>thighs<s%> they shall reach: <S%H1961><s%>

And they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> when they come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> when they come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place; that they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H4191>die:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> unto him and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.
